text: Making the Batter Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF. Prepare the sponge pans by greasing them. Mix the cocoa with the butter until it forms a paste.  Add the sugar. Mix well until it is smooth. Add the eggs, vanilla and water. Stir to combine thoroughly. Add the flour, baking soda and baking powder to the mixture. Blend until smooth. Add the crushed candy. Stir through. Pour the evenly divided batter into the prepared cake pans. Smooth the tops to make them even. Baking the Cake Place in the preheated oven. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until the the cake starts to come away from the edges of the pans. Remove from the oven. Allow to cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire cooling rack to cool completely. Icing the Cake Ice the cake. Use butter icing or white icing. Try the following if you'd like a more interesting topping for the cake: Prepare white icing, adding a few drops of peppermint extract (essence) and some green food coloring. Pipe a design on the top of the cake. Pipe lines, a tree shape, or a message. Allow to set. The cake is now ready to be served.
